mapper.sql: id as d ,info_id as nfoId ,occupation as ccupation ,background_id as ackgroundId ,background as ackground ,background_score as ackgroundScore ,fur_id as urId ,fur as ur ,fur_score as urScore ,clothes_id as lothesId ,clothes as lothes ,clothes_score as lothesScore ,facial_expression_id as acialExpressionId ,facial_expression as acialExpression ,facial_expression_score as acialExpressionScore ,head_expression_id as eadExpressionId ,head as ead ,head_score as eadScore ,create_time as reateTime ,update_time as pdateTime
